titles.title: Top Tech for USA Act of 2014
To provide the heads of agencies with direct-hire authority to appoint qualified candidates to positions relating to information technology, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 5/7/2014--Introduced. Top Tech for USA Act of 2014 - Authorizes the head of a federal executive agency, for five years after enactment of this Act, to exercise direct-hire authority to appoint qualified candidates to positions relating to information technology, including web or digital systems design and development.
